long_description: The Louis Garneau Arm Warmers are a favorite among seasoned cyclists for their lighweight warmth and smart design. Stretchy nylon and spandex moves effortlessly with you; brushed interior offers moisture-wicking and insulating properties. Flatlock seam construction is soft and non-chafing next to skin. Upper arm grippers keeps warmers snugly in place; when the day warms up, warmers pack away easily. Reflective logos increase your visibility to motorists in low light. Fabric provides UPF 50+ sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. The Louis Garneau Arm Warmers should be ordered in the same size as your jersey.
short_description: The Louis Garneau Arm Warmers are a favorite among seasoned cyclists for their lighweight warmth and smart design.
